meanings.definition: A drug used in chemotherapy to treat various types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cyclophosphamide to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Patients often receive cyclophosphamide as part of their cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The cancer cells were no match for the mighty cyclophosphamide!
meanings.sent4: Cyclophosphamide acted like a brave soldier battling the cancer army.
meanings.sent5: The cyclophosphamide worked tirelessly to combat the disease.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication commonly known by the brand name Cytoxan.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist explained that cyclophosphamide is the same as Cytoxan.
meanings.sent2: Some patients may be prescribed cyclophosphamide instead of Cytoxan.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally took the cyclophosphamide when I meant to take Cytoxan!
meanings.sent4: In the world of medications, cyclophosphamide is like the undercover Cytoxan.
meanings.sent5: Remember to pick up the cyclophosphamide from the pharmacy for your treatment.
